Name: Nostalgici Anonimi
About the game: HELLO WORLD! Welcome to the Steam page of Nostalgici Anonimi a short story driven adventure game where dialogue, listening and card interpretations are your only weapons. Your choices will determine the course of events and lead to different endings. In a dystopian future where emotions and nostalgia are considered a disease, the government has created the program Nostalgic Anonymous, run by android therapists. You will arrive in this future and meet the android helping three teenagers suffering from the nostalgia disease. They love past narrations, and Angel wants to stop this and turn them in good citizens. They, however, don't want to change and just want to escape. And this where your journey starts. Will you help Angel or the teenagers? Will you be able to come back to the present? What are you waiting for? Sign up to the Nostalgici Anonimi program now! __________ Nominated at the Italian Video Game Awards for Best Italian Debut Game __________ PLEASE READ: Nostalgici Anonimi is an ongoing project and will add new chapters and features in the future. We are working hard to solve bugs and improve the game, please contact us if you experience problems. WORKAROUND: If you experience a bug that won't let you choose, please try to exit to the main menu and continue. This will solve the problem in most cases. A STORY BUILT TOGETHER Nostalgici Anonimi is going to be written with you! We released the first two chapters, and we are working on the third; we will listen to your feedback and suggestion, shaping the story together. Discuss with the community and the developer on our social media pages: Server Discord Join the community on Reddit! / Leave your feedback here You can contact us also on Instagram / __________ MADE WITH CARE To honestly represent themes and problematics lived by the teenagers in our society, Nostalgici Anonimi is realized thanks to the support of “Fondazione Mite” and consulting a team of psychologist from “Istituto Di Ortofonologia”. You can find their email in the page info. __________ TEAM Game Director & Narrative Designer: Jacopo Mascolini Art Director: Ilaria Treppiccioni Lead Programmer: Mario A. Di Bernardo Programmer Chapter 1: David Burioni Music & Sound: Federico Bianchi Psychologist: Mauro Giulietti Educator: Giorgio Anello Executive Producer: Magda Di Renzo
